languages.text: [draft] Enemies that suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} from an attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} from the psyker must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} until the start of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Enemies that suffer a critical hit from an attacking psychic power from the Psyker must pass a Willpower resistant test or become blinded until the start of the Psyker's next turn.
Enemies that suffer a critical hit from an attacking psychic power from the Psyker must pass a Willpower resistant test or become blinded until the start of the Psyker's next turn.
Enemies that suffer a critical hit from an attacking psychic power from the psyker must pass a Willpower resistance test or become blinded until the start of the psyker's next turn.
Enemies that suffer a critical hit from an attacking psychic power from the psyker must pass a Willpower resistance test or become blinded until the start of the psyker's next turn.
[draft] Enemies that suffer a critical hit from an attacking psychic power from the psyker must pass a Willpower resistance test or become blinded until the start of the psyker's next turn.
[draft] Enemies that suffer a critical hit from an attacking psychic power from the psyker must pass a Willpower resistance test or become blinded until the start of the psyker's next turn.

languages.text: [暂定] 如果灵能者的攻击性灵能对目标造成暴击，则目标需要进行意志抗性检定。如果目标未能通过检定，就会陷入致盲状态，直到灵能者的下个回合开始为止。
languages.original_text: [draft] Enemies that suffer a critical hit from an attacking psychic power from the psyker must pass a Willpower resistance test or become blinded until the start of the psyker's next turn.

traits.locale_text: [暂定] 如果灵能者的攻击性灵能对目标造成暴击，则目标需要进行意志抗性检定。如果目标未能通过检定，就会陷入致盲状态，直到灵能者的下个回合开始为止。

languages.text: [provisional] Los enemigos que sufren un impacto crítico de un poder psíquico ofensivo del psíquico deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad o quedar cegados hasta el principio del siguiente turno del psíquico.
languages.original_text: [draft] Enemies that suffer a critical hit from an attacking psychic power from the psyker must pass a Willpower resistance test or become blinded until the start of the psyker's next turn.

traits.locale_text: [provisional] Los enemigos que sufren un impacto crítico de un poder psíquico ofensivo del psíquico deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad o quedar cegados hasta el principio del siguiente turno del psíquico.

languages.text: [草案]異能者の超能力での攻撃でクリティカルヒットを受けた敵は、意志力の抵抗判定を行わなければならず、失敗した場合は異能者の次のターンまで盲目状態になる。
languages.original_text: [draft] Enemies that suffer a critical hit from an attacking psychic power from the psyker must pass a Willpower resistance test or become blinded until the start of the psyker's next turn.

traits.locale_text: [草案]異能者の超能力での攻撃でクリティカルヒットを受けた敵は、意志力の抵抗判定を行わなければならず、失敗した場合は異能者の次のターンまで盲目状態になる。
[草案]異能者の超能力での攻撃でクリティカルヒットを受けた敵は、意志力の抵抗判定を行わなければならず、失敗した場合は異能者の次のターンまで盲目状態になる。

languages.text: [brouillon] Les ennemis qui subissent un coup critique suite à une attaque psychique du psyker doivent réussir un test de résistance lié à la Volonté ou ils subissent l'effet Aveuglement jusqu'au début du tour suivant du psyker.
languages.original_text: [draft] Enemies that suffer a critical hit from an attacking psychic power from the psyker must pass a Willpower resistance test or become blinded until the start of the psyker's next turn.

traits.locale_text: [brouillon] Les ennemis qui subissent un coup critique suite à une attaque psychique du psyker doivent réussir un test de résistance lié à la Volonté ou ils subissent l'effet Aveuglement jusqu'au début du tour suivant du psyker.

languages.text: [Entwurf] Gegner, die einen kritischen Treffer durch eine angreifende psionische Kraft des Psionikers erleiden, müssen eine Widerstandsprobe auf Willenskraft bestehen oder werden bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zuges des Psionikers geblendet.
languages.original_text: [draft] Enemies that suffer a critical hit from an attacking psychic power from the psyker must pass a Willpower resistance test or become blinded until the start of the psyker's next turn.
